string.text: Stalker, you're approaching the barrier. We'd be happy to accept any help here, if you're willing
Marked One, come and see us for your reward, and further instructions...
Marked One, come back and help us hold the position!
You can always guarantee that if you spend a night up in that village tower, something will happen every time...
Remember what they say in the mines, "Engineers are never wrong twice..." They can't afford to be!
Marked One, be careful. News is that the village has a new anomaly - the bitch moves all over the place, AND it's invisible...

Okay, men, the Monolith are coming! Let's show them we're not known as 'The Barrier' for nothing. We're here to hold the passage to Radar! \nI think you already know what we're up against here, Strelok... Good luck!
Here they come! Let's teach the bastards a lesson. Fire at will!
Well done, everyone! We're returning to the farm. We'll settle all accounts there...
Come on, guys! The path's clear...
Marked One, watch out for the sniper!
Be careful, Marked One, or your head will be home to a sniper's bullet...
